mapper.insert: insert into intermediary (intermediary_name, intermediary_contact, intermediary_contact_tel, area_id, user_id, intermediary_logo_url, intermediary_introduction) values (#{intermediaryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{intermediaryContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{intermediaryContactTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{areaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{intermediaryLogoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{intermediaryIntroduction,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update intermediary set intermediary_name = #{intermediaryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, intermediary_contact = #{intermediaryContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, intermediary_contact_tel = #{intermediaryContactTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area_id = #{areaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, intermediary_logo_url = #{intermediaryLogoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, intermediary_introduction = #{intermediaryIntroduction,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where intermediary_id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select intermediary_id, intermediary_name, intermediary_contact, intermediary_contact_tel, area_id, user_id, intermediary_logo_url, intermediary_create_time, intermediary_update_time, intermediary_introduction from intermediary where intermediary_id = #{intermediaryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select intermediary_id, intermediary_name, intermediary_contact, intermediary_contact_tel, area_id, user_id, intermediary_logo_url, intermediary_create_time, intermediary_update_time, intermediary_introduction from intermediary

select intermediary_id, intermediary_name, intermediary_contact, intermediary_contact_tel, area_id, user_id, intermediary_logo_url, intermediary_create_time, intermediary_update_time, intermediary_introduction FROM intermediary WHERE 1=1 and 2=2
